title: **Helm of Comprehending Languages**
explicit_references: See the *Player's Handbook* for more information on creature size and space
rule_text:
#### **Helm of Comprehending Languages**

*Wondrous item, uncommon*

While wearing this helm, you can use an action to cast the *comprehend languages* spell from it at will.
rule_hierarchy: **Magic Items** > **Gem of Seeing** > **Helm of Comprehending Languages**
